description:
Oct 10-13: Banff Trail to Sunnyside (Single Tracking)

These stations will NOT be fully closed, this is a partial closure.

The northbound track will be closed at Lions Park, SAIT/AUArts/Jubilee, and Sunnyside stations for construction work starting at 8:30 p.m. on Friday, October 10 until start of service on Tuesday, October 14.

Please vist calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service for more information.

Blue Line: Service Disruption

CTrain riders, please be aware that Blue Line trains are currently unable to service between Bridgeland and City Hall stations.

Train service is split into two segments:

  • 69 Street Station to City Hall Station
  • Bridgeland/Memorial Station to Saddletowne Station

Shuttle buses are running between City Hall and Bridgeland stations to connect passengers between the two segments. We appreciate your patience while we work together to get things rolling again!
